title: Augusta Canal National Heritage Area: Park Home
body: The Power of Water: Augusta Canal  Augusta Canal helped usher the Industrial Revolution into the South by harnessing Savannah River to power mills and factories, including the Confederate Powder Works. One of the only intact, functioning American 19th century industrial power canal systems and home to diverse plants and animals of the southeastern Fall Line, Augusta Canal National Heritage Area is an oasis for outdoor recreation. Read More             Mississippi Hills NHA   Mississippi Hills NHA, one of 12 heritage areas in the Southeast.  Explore food, music and history.
